catalogueR 0.1.0

    • catalogueR: intro

Iterate queries to eQTL Catalogue

Source: R/fetch.R
catalogueR.eQTL_catalogue.iterate_loci.Rd

Uses coordinates from stored summary stats files (e.g. GWAS) to determine which regions to query from eQTL Catalogue.

catalogueR.eQTL_catalogue.iterate_loci(
  sumstats_paths,
  loci_names = NULL,
  output_path,
  qtl_id,
  quant_method = "ge",
  infer_region = T,
  use_tabix = T,
  multithread_loci = T,
  multithread_tabix = F,
  nThread = 4,
  split_files = T,
  merge_with_gwas = F,
  force_new_subset = F,
  progress_bar = T,
  genome_build = "hg19"
)
